title: Post Game: Dany Pletka talks perspective in Washington and why sanctions aren't easy
description: Dany Pletka, Senior Fellow at the American Enterprise Institute, joins Chuck to talk about the Russian attack on Ukraine and why she believes everyone in Washington has "a perspective."
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Dany Pletka, Senior Fellow at the American Enterprise Institute, joins Chuck to talk about the Russian attack on Ukraine and why she believes everyone in Washington has "a perspective."
